sqlMap.statement: SELECT SMM.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,SMM.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK FROM SVC_MACH_MSTR SMM ,IWR_RGTN_COND IRC WHERE IRC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND IRC.IWR_RGTN_DT IS NOT NULL AND IRC.IWR_DEINS_DT IS NULL AND IRC.IWR_LAST_COMM_TS <= #iwrLastCommTs# AND IRC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND IRC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SMM.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND IRC.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK = SMM.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK AND SMM.SHR_DLR_FLG = #shrDlrFlg# AND SMM.IWR_COND_CD = #iwrCondCd# AND SMM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
